term.title: gauche effect

item.text: The stabilization of the gauche (synclinal) conformation in a two carbon unit bonded vicinally to electronegative elements e.g. 1,2-difluoroethane.
The destabilization of the gauche (synclinal) conformation in a two carbon unit bonded vicinally to large, soft and polarizable elements such as sulfur and bromine.
